author: Alain Kouya, Alios6
description:
Adds button animation effect bounce, zoom in, zoom out, etc...(Requires Tween behavior)
Detection of interaction with the button:
-is pressed
-is just pressed 
-is on(switch button)
-is release
The inspiration comes from godot.
coming soon the addition of text in the buttons.
name: Buttons
shortDescription: With this behavior you can interact with this object as a button

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: This behavior allows to use the object as a button, with a text inside (Optional)
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Buttons

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers the action one time only when the button is pressed
eventsFunctions.name: JustPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers the action as long as the button is pressed
eventsFunctions.name: Pressed

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers the action one time only when the button is released
eventsFunctions.name: Release

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers the action as long as the button is on (Here the button behaves like a switch)
eventsFunctions.name: On_Off

eventsFunctions.description: Allows you to link a text object to the button
eventsFunctions.fullName: Add a Text object to the button
eventsFunctions.name: AddTextObject

eventsFunctions.description: Allows you to link a BBText  object to the button
eventsFunctions.fullName: Add a BBText object to the button
eventsFunctions.name: AddBBTextObject

eventsFunctions.description: Allows you to link a Bitmap text object to the button
eventsFunctions.fullName: Add a Bitmap text object to the button
eventsFunctions.name: AddBitmapTextObject

propertyDescriptors.label: The tween animation when the mouse hovers over the button
propertyDescriptors.name: AllowToucheEffect

propertyDescriptors.label: Choose the animation when the cursor hovers over the button
propertyDescriptors.name: ToucheEffect

propertyDescriptors.label: The tween animation when the mouse clicks on the button
propertyDescriptors.name: AllowClickEffect

propertyDescriptors.label: Choose the animation when the button is clicked
propertyDescriptors.name: ClickEffect

propertyDescriptors.label: The shade when the mouse clicks on the button
propertyDescriptors.name: AllowColorClickEffect

propertyDescriptors.label: The text that will be displayed on the button
propertyDescriptors.name: ButtonText
